title: Joined By Neanderthals Known As Skip Martin & Mike Rosales
itunes:title: Joined By Neanderthals Known As Skip Martin & Mike Rosales
description:
This week on The Cigar Authority we will be joined by couple of Cromagnon Neanderthal’s and the owners of RoMaCraft Tobac; Skip Martin & Mike Rosales. They’ve been in town for a series of events and we spend the full 2 hours of The Cigar Authority with these crazy individuals on a show that is sure to get out of hand fast.

We will be smoking the Intemperance and have a discussion on the differences between Europe and North American in the cigar industry. While in the second hour we will light up the Cromagnon Fomarian.

All that and the usual bag of tricks Debonaire Mr. J, Asylum Barry, Cigar News and a Classic 3 Way.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/..
